text: Frank Gerard Burke (born April 22, 1927) was an American civil servant. He served as Acting Archivist of the United States from April 16, 1985, to December 4, 1987. He received his Ph.D. from the University of Chicago. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:Archivists of the United States Category:People from New York City
title: Frank G. Burke
